articles.description: Natural gas is an economic disaster in the US and global demand will fall a record 3% this year. IEA says gas is not a bridging fuel.
articles.content:
Natural gas flare Source
You know that things are changing when in some parts of the world it is cheaper to build a new solar PV facility with battery storage than to run a coal or gas power plant. … [+23566 chars]

articles.author: Charlie Osborne
articles.title: Home Depot agrees to $17.5 million settlement over 2014 data breach - ZDNet
articles.description: The US retailer’s point-of-sale systems were infected with malware.
articles.content:
Home Depot has agreed to a $17.5 million settlement in a multi-state investigation of a data breach suffered by the company in 2014.
Delaware Attorney-General Kathy Jennings announced the settlement… [+2391 chars]
